Kirby.name: Kirby
Kirby.description: A well-rounded rider with balanced stats and forgiving handling.

KingDedede.name: King Dedede
KingDedede.description: A heavyweight bruiser with strong offense and great durability, but sluggish control.

MetaKnight.name: Meta Knight
MetaKnight.description: A fast aerial specialist with sharp mobility and excellent flight performance.

BandanaWaddleDee.name: Bandana Waddle Dee
BandanaWaddleDee.description: A nimble rider with high handling and acceleration, but very fragile.

WaddleDoo.name: Waddle Doo
WaddleDoo.description: A spark-wielding rider with strong energy output but low speed and durability.

ChefKawasaki.name: Chef Kawasaki
ChefKawasaki.description: A bulky rider with strong HP and offense, but poor control and acceleration.

KnuckleJoe.name: Knuckle Joe
KnuckleJoe.description: A balanced fighter with excellent offense and solid handling.

Rick.name: Rick
Rick.description: A powerhouse with massive strength and HP, but very low aerial mobility.

Gooey.name: Gooey
Gooey.description: A flexible rider with great handling but low durability and speed.

Cappy.name: Cappy
Cappy.description: A super-light rider with excellent control and boost, but extremely low weight.

Scarfy.name: Scarfy
Scarfy.description: An unpredictable rider with great handling but extremely poor speed and HP.

Starman.name: Starman
Starman.description: A gliding specialist with great grip and flight, but almost no durability.

Magolor.name: Magolor
Magolor.description: A tricky magic-user with strong offense and flight ability, but modest handling.

Susie.name: Susie
Susie.description: A corporate combatant with high speed and offense but poor handling.
